author: kkrajczar
body:
The Preshower digis are removed in step 2 of the HI RelVal workflows. @mandrenguyen pointed out that this removal is not necessary, and the digis should be kept. (The removal of the Preshower digis probably meant to represent an early PbPb data taking period, where Preshower was not used. Nevertheless, the removal of the digis has become obsolete by now.)

@BetterWang, @yetkinyilmaz
title: Keep the Preshower digis in HI RelVal
